summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6714 for the improvement of The Alley in Plat of Montbeacon, being the alley between 12th Ave. S. and 13th Ave. S. from S. Forest St. to S. McClellan St.; and certain other alleys; by paving the same, by doing such grading or regrading as may be necessary; providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance 108372, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and amending Ordinance 108372, Section 4, removing the interest limit on the Local Improvement Bonds.
